Sub:SubmissionofStatementofElectionExpenditureofHaryana,2024-Regarding.

India(both hard andsoft copies), for the elections heldfor the legislative assemblyof
Haryanaintheprescribedformat.WedidnotcontesttheelectioninJammuandKashmir.
